text: "The Goodies – Almost Live" is an episode of the British comedy television series The Goodies. This episode, which takes the form of a pop concert, is also known as "The Goodies in Concert". The Goodies also appear as "Pan's Grannies". Written by The Goodies, with songs and music by Bill Oddie. ==Songs== The songs, featured in the show (in chronological order), are: {| style="margin:auto;" class="wikitable sortable" |- !
